Reference

All functions

pois_cov_canonical()

Get List of Canonical Covariance Matrices

pois_cov_ed() pois_cov_ed_control_default()

Estimate Prior Covariance Matrices using Extreme Deconvolution

pois_cov_init()

Initialize Data-driven Prior Covariance Matrices using PCA

pois_mash() pois_mash_control_default()

Fit poisson mash to data

Prefit Poisson MASH Model without DE Effects

Create Data Object for Poisson MASH Analysis

pois_mash_sim_data()
